Text:
This album is really great. I love it so much, I'm going to buy it, actually. Every single track is great, they've managed to keep the spirit of the original songs, and toughened them up a lot. Recommended! I have listened to it so many times, and still not tired of it. Whenever I browse my MP3 collection, I always end up playing at least some tracks from this album!

This reminds me why I now download music before I buy it, after having bought so many albums that were utter garbage (to me, anyway). Thanks PB.
GREAT ALBUM, still dont understand why you would want to buy the album if youve already downloaded it though... sort of defeats the object of it!
